## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserScriptTask] class is able to run all the scripts normally run by the one of its subclasses, however it ignores the results. It is intended to execute user-supplied scripts and will execute them outside of the application’s sandbox, if any.

If you need to execute scripts and get the input and output information use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserUnixTask], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAppleScriptTask], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAutomatorTask] sub classes.

# NSUserScriptTask

**Class**

An object that executes scripts.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSUserScriptTask
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserScriptTask] class is able to run all the scripts normally run by the one of its subclasses, however it ignores the results. It is intended to execute user-supplied scripts and will execute them outside of the application’s sandbox, if any.

If you need to execute scripts and get the input and output information use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserUnixTask], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAppleScriptTask], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserAutomatorTask] sub classes.

## Specifying the Script

- **init(url:)**: Return a user script task instance given a URL for a script file.
- **scriptURL**: The URL of the script file.

## Executing the User Script

- **execute(completionHandler:)**: Executes the script with no input and ignoring any result.

## Constants

- **NSUserScriptTask.CompletionHandler**: Implement this block to retrieve the error of the script executed by [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserScriptTask/execute(completionHandler:)].

## Scripts and External Tasks

- **Process**: An object that represents a subprocess of the current process.
- **NSUserAppleScriptTask**: An object that executes AppleScript scripts.
- **NSUserAutomatorTask**: An object that executes Automator workflows.
- **NSUserUnixTask**: An object that executes unix applications.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- NSUserAppleScriptTask
- NSUserAutomatorTask
- NSUserUnixTask

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
